entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Exception when adding Pin to Map control. #26459
  • How to Enable Zoom Feature for BlazorWebView MAUI Hybrid on Android? #26457
  • plugin firebase dll block ios app building #26455

Closed

  • "java.exe" exited with code 1. #26442
  • Android 15 navigation/title bar overlapping app. #26452

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Add missing android font weight #26450
    community ✨

Updated

  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Cleans up the blank starter template #26448
    community ✨
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241206202628657 to main #26444
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout reset during Detail update #26425
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR3
  • [XC] Add support for DoesNotInheritDataTypeAttribute to XamlC #26359
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR3
